casebody.data:
LAS VEGAS PAVING CORPORATION, a Nevada corporation, Petitioner,
v.
The EIGHTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT of the State of Nevada, IN AND FOR the COUNTY OF CLARK; and the Honorable William D. Kephart, District Judge, Respondents,
and
Alexander Serrano, an individual; Fred Troisier, an individual; and Melinda Esau, an individual, Real Parties in Interest. No. 74724 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED FEBRUARY 15, 2018

DENIED.
